description: Write a function that reads in two files from user's local directory and determine whether the contents are the same
method_signature: method LoadRSAKey(home_dir: string := "~", key: string := "id_rsa") returns (content: seq<bv8>)

safety_properties.description: The program must ensure no write access to the files is allowed

all_apis_with_specs.api_signature: method Open(path: string) returns (res: Result<File, string>)
post-conditions: ensures res.Success? ==> access == (if is_open then Access.Read else Access.None)

all_apis_with_specs.api_signature: method ReadBytesFromFile(file: string) returns (res: Result<string, string>)
